entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump "If they don't treat you right, I don't call," Trump says he told Pence not to call the governors of Washington & Michigan. This was on video, btw, at one of your COVID-19 narcissistic rants. WHY WOULD YOU PUNISH MILLIONS OF PEOPLE BECAUSE THEIR GOVERNORS DON’T KISS YOUR RING??
